Interesting item on eBay web site item Cannondale Criterium R Road BikeI saw this item for sale at eBay the worlds largest personal trading community and thought that you might be interested Vaa Oy Yoy Title of item Cannondale Criterium R Road Bike Seller votefreedomst Starts Oct PDT Ends Oct PDT Price Currently To bid on the item go to awcgieBayISAPIdllViewItemitem Item Description cm in Cannondale Criterium RoadRacing Bike You are bidding on an aluminum frame Cannondale Criterium Model R cm bicycle I am the original and only owner of this bike This bike is white with blue lettering The components are the original Suntour Accushift alpha group Also included are Time criterium pedals with shoe cleats a Profile Aerobar a Cateye Vectra CC computer needs battery Mistral rims a Vetta saddle and Diacompe brakes I am also including a Zefel hp X pump that fits nicely beneath the top tube which is not shown The small blue saddle bag shown in the photo is the only accessory not included This bike has been hanging in my garage by the stem and saddle not by the rims for the last few years The tires have gone down but will hold air for a few days It does have a few paint chips on the front fork see photo and there is surface rust in these chips on the rear freewheel and on the chain With a good cleaning good lube and new rubber this will be an awesome bike at a great price Dont miss this great chance to get atop Cannondale Craftsmanship Shipping I will take to this bike to a bicycle shop in the or area for packaging and shipping Winning bidder will pay the final bid plus actual packaging and shipping costs I estimate about total SH Call your local bike shop or call a bike shop in the zipcode areas listed to get an estimate Payment If you want to use a credit card for payment you can click on the Bidpay icon below to order a Bidpay money order I will also accept payment by check must clear my credit union or US money order ships upon receipt Other I reserve the right to cancel this auction as this bike is also for sale locally Good Luck and thank for looking Visit eBay the worlds largest Personal Trading Community at
